name: Die To Pass
description:
This is a Game that developed for Academy Club - Game Jam 1 under 48 hours Theme : Every Death is Useful !

W : Jump

A - D : Move left and right

F : Interact

E : Die

Cem Kaan Ugur : Developer - Designer - UI

Cem Celik :  Level Designer - Developer

Eren Cicek : Sound - Developer

Eren Aydın : Developer

Dogan Genc : Project Manager

we didn't have any 2D Artist on the team so most of the assets are Free Assets Licensed under CC0
